column4: Cyber attack could spark lawsuits but not against Microsoft
column5: May 15 Businesses that failed to update Microsoft Windows-based computer systems that were hit by a massive cyber attack over the weekend could be sued over their lax cyber security  but Microsoft Corp itself enjoys strong protection from lawsuits  legal experts said.

column4: ValueAct's Ubben taps Morfit for CIO post in succession plan
column5: BOSTON Activist hedge fund investor Jeffrey Ubben is handing over the reins of his $16 billion investment firm by promoting long-time business partner Mason Morfit to chief investment officer.

column4: Former SolarCity CEO Lyndon Rive will leave Tesla
column5: SolarCity founder Lyndon Rive  who steered the dramatic growth of the biggest U.S. residential solar company before driving its sale to Tesla Inc   is leaving the electric vehicle maker in June  he said on Monday.
